pages.text: $(#FF9900)Custom blocks$() allow you to freely adjust a block's visual position, rotation and tint. Just put down a custom block, right click with on it another block item in your hand, and the custom block will turn into its shape. You can adjust a custom block's position and rotation with corresponding tools, and using them while crouching(holding L-Shift) will apply opposite transformations.

pages.title: Transformations
pages.text: The $(#FF9900)transform arrow$() is a reference direction marker useful when moving custom block.$(br)It points to the 'forward' direction of this custom block, and can be toggled by right clicking with an empty hand.

pages.title: Tinting & Lighting
pages.text: The $(#FF9900)dyeable parts$() of custom blocks can be tinted into any color with a palette, for example, the top grass part of a grass block, and the wooden frame of an easel menu block. Using any type of axe on a custom block can cycle its $(#FF9900)lighting value$() from 0 to 15.
A few custom grass blocks with $(#FF0000)diff$(#FFAA00)eren$(#EEBB00)t ti$(#BBEE00)nts$().
